for a longer or shorter tunic add or subtract multiples of 3 your starting chain will be a multiple of 3 + 2 + 2 for the turning chain  for a wider or narrower tunic add/subtract repeats of row 3-6 ending on a repeat of row 5  for a less plunging neckline move each of your markers on row 1 an equal number of stitches towards the middle and join up to that marker when you assemble your piece  for a looser fit on the hips you can include vents on the sides by beginning the side assembly a few inches up from the bottom hem sleeves optional note the sample in the photographs does not have the
